description.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"heading-1","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"call to submissions: self-portraits","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"our ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://9vtbackslash5.com/catalogue/moods"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Moods","marks":[{"type":"underline"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":" series began when our dear friend ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://9vtbackslash5.com/catalogue/moods/cottu"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Juju","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":" discovered ten portraits from the year 2020, each portraying a piece of her during that period of her life.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"we liked the collection and the idea behind it, so we decided to sell it and urge other artists to do submit collections of work along a similar vein.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"using the term 'self-portrait' loosely, we urge artists to submit works that represent themselves.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"this may sound redundant, like an industry platitude â€” and, of course, it is, because all of an artist's work represents them.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"But still, sometimes it is nice to have a framework to work within, and a series of collections of works that all do the same thing in very different ways.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}
